alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, central Bay and northwestern Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 443 PM EDT/343 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Panama City Beach to near Callaway to 10 miles southeast of Wewahitchka. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Apalachicola, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Parker, Ebro, Honeyville, Allanton, Dirego Park, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach and Beverly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Washington
